pages.text: You have mastered $(l:enchanting/matrix)matrix enchanting$() and $(l:enchanting/influence)candle influence$(). Now you want to take it further. Here are a few things you should know:$(br2)Try combining your tool with a golden tool of the same type to reduce the cost of enchanting. This way you will never be faced with the dreaded 'Too Expensive' message.

There are some ways to obtain enchantments beyond their supposed maximum level. The first way is to obtain magical Tomes. You can find them in Dungeons and Strongholds.$(br)But perhaps you want to obtain enchantments of a level even higher. Then, travel as far as possible, to the $(l:exploration/outerlands)Outerlands$(). Strange underground structures called Vaults are to be found under Stone Circles, and they are said to contain legendary weapons, the power of which is inconceivable.
